title: Ranked 5 Teammates wanted (Plat-Dia) GER/ENG speaking.
body:
**Hello fellow Player,**

I am looking to gather some peeps around to start a ranked team.
If you are **between Plat and Dia**, flexible, (mostly) calm, enthusiastic AND online for most days a week, this is the right team for you.
I want everyone to play his main role, all the time, if possible.
If you want join in, feel free to add and msg me (Summoner name: DuN Ollowayn).

Greetings
Jan
